title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 22.96 - Cost of promulgation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 22.96 - Cost of promulgation

State Regulations

The cost of all proceedings necessary for the
promulgation of this order shall be the liability of the administration fund. The fiscal agent shall reimburse the department from such fund for all costs
incurred by the department in the promulgation of this order. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
22.96

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
